mapper.select: select * from tb_pro_module where pro_code=#{proCode} and is_vaild=1
select pro.mod_id as modId from tb_ht_module ht,tb_pro_module pro where ht.mod_id=pro.mod_id and ht.ht_no=#{htNo}
select CONCAT(pro.mod_id,',',pro.mod_name) from tb_ht_module mo,tb_pro_module pro where mo.mod_id=pro.mod_id and mo.ht_no=#{htNo}
